attributes.action: Make dog ownership a licensed requirement.
attributes.additional_details:
To stop breed specific legislation, stop the back yard breeders as the demand for dog ownership will be less. Stop badly trained dogs being a danger to the community. 

Save the XL bully's!
attributes.background: All citizens must take courses on dog training and psychology paid from their own pocket to attain a licence for dog ownership. Different categories of license should determine acceptable breeds for specific licences. No dog should have to be banned if it cannot be acquired by the correct people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509
Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control
